dailyRefill.title: Daily hearts refill
dailyRefill.content: Get a full-hearts refill every 24 hours. Make it to the top and earn rewards for being the smartest player in the World!

howToPlay.title: How to play?
howToPlay.content: Spin the wheel. Get daily random topics, play a trivia mini-game and earn JUZ!

templates.heartPointsExplainer: Buy a pack of {amount} hearts. Hearts will be added to your current heart points.
templates.buyHearts: Confirm to buy a Pack of {amount} hearts in JUZ Mini App

JUZDistributionModal.title: JUZ Breakdown
JUZDistributionModal.claimAvailable: You have JUZ Tokens available to claim

errors.waitabit: Wait a bit before claiming again

LeaderBoard.refreshMessage: Leaderboard can take a while to refresh. Thanks for your patience!

DialogHearts.title: Manage game hearts

explainers.full: Hearts are used to play trivia games. When you miss a question, you lose a heart.
explainers.regular: Hearts are refilled for free every 24 hours. You can also buy a refill with WLD.

DialogHearts.buyRefillMessage: Confirm to refill a total of {hearts} hearts in JUZ Mini App

ModalGame.loadingText: Buckle up! We are cooking the trivia for you...
